notifications.name: Mexican Food
notifications.description: Spicy, savory, and diverse dishes from Mexico.

notifications.name: Sushi
notifications.description: Japanese delicacy featuring vinegared rice and various ingredients.

notifications.name: Seafood
notifications.description: Fresh catches from the ocean, grilled, fried, or steamed to perfection.

notifications.name: Italian Food
notifications.description: Classic pasta dishes, pizzas, and flavorful risottos.

notifications.name: Fast Food
notifications.description: Quick and easy meals like burgers, fries, and fried chicken.

notifications.name: Chinese Food
notifications.description: Aromatic stir-fries, flavorful noodles, and savory dumplings.

notifications.name: Indian Food
notifications.description: Aromatic curries, flavorful rice dishes, and tasty naan breads.

notifications.name: American Food
notifications.description: Hearty burgers, juicy steaks, and comfort food classics.

notifications.name: Mediterranean Food
notifications.description: Fresh vegetables, grilled meats, and flavorful dips like hummus.

notifications.name: Desserts
notifications.description: Sweet treats like cakes, cookies, ice cream, and pastries.
